result.translation: Nítorí náà, Mò ń fi àwọn àyè tí ìkọ̀ọ̀kan gbólóhùn al-Ƙur’ān wà nínú sánmọ̀ búra.[1]
result.footnotes: 1. “Mọwāƙi‘u-nnujūm” tún lè túmọ̀ sí “àwọn ibùsọ̀ ìràwọ̀ nínú sánmọ̀”. Nítorí náà, ìtúmọ̀ mìíràn fún āyah yìí nìyí: “Nítorí náà, Mò ń fi àwọn ibùsọ̀ ìràwọ̀ búra.”
